abstract: New York Red Bulls and New York City Football Club are set to renew their one-game-old rivalry in upcoming Major League Soccer game at Yankee Stadium.
lead_paragraph: While the Red Bulls have moved away from their strategy of making splashy player acquisitions, N.Y.C.F.C. has stolen that page from their playbook.

headline.main: Red Bulls and New York City F.C. Will Meet but Their Approaches Don’t
headline.print_headline: Red Bulls and New York City F.C. Converge; Their Approaches Do Not

snippet: While the Red Bulls have moved away from their strategy of making splashy player acquisitions, N.Y.C.F.C. has stolen that page from their playbook.
